text: Provide single Error enum per module, mark as non_exhaustive if variants may grow. Export from mod.rs, implement in internal.rs. Makes error handling predictable and documentation clear.
Ask "Are we solving the wrong problem?" when hitting unexpected technical constraints - may indicate invented requirements
Use Rust for CLI and core logic - let the compiler be your guard rail. Rust type system catches errors at compile time that would be runtime bugs in other languages.
